workerManagerConstructionJobDistribution

Class ConstructionJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • workerManagerConstructionJobDistribution.ConstructionJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConstrucionInformation

    class ConstructionJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConstrucionInformation
    ConstructionJob.java --- A Class containing the UnitType, the location and the worker that is going to construct the building as well as a few other information of the state of the "action".
    Author:
    P H - 05.09.2017

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()
        Function for initializing all basic functionalities of the job.

      • reserveResources

        private void reserveResources(bwapi.UnitType unitType)
        Function for reserving resources based on a provided UnitType. Both types (Minerals as well as gas) are reserved based on the amount the assigned building's UnitType requires.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the UnitType whose mineral and gas prices are going to be reserved.

      • freeResources

        private void freeResources(bwapi.UnitType unitType)
        Function for freeing resources based on a provided UnitType. Both types (Minerals as well as gas) are reserved based on the amount the assigned building's UnitType requires.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the UnitType whose mineral and gas prices are going to be freed.

      • freeResourcesIfNecessary

        void freeResourcesIfNecessary()
        Function for freeing the reserved resources of this ConstructionJob if it's construction state is still in the IDLE form. This is necessary since the worker assigned to this ConstructionJob might be destroyed before the construction of the building can be at least started which would in the resources normally being freed.

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from interface: IConstrucionInformation
        Function for passing an update cycle to the ConstructionJob in which the information of it is / can be updated.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IConstrucionInformation

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Description copied from interface: IConstrucionInformation
        Function for retrieving information about the state of the ConstructionJob. Returns true if the construction of the building is finished and the worker is not longer actively working on the building Unit.
        Specified by:
        isFinished in interface IConstrucionInformation
        Returns:
        true if the construction of the building is finished, false if not.

      • constructionStarted

        public boolean constructionStarted()
        Description copied from interface: IConstrucionInformation
        Function for retrieving information about the state of the ConstructionJob. Returns true if the construction actually started and the ConstructionJob found a matching Unit on the map.
        Specified by:
        constructionStarted in interface IConstrucionInformation
        Returns:
        true if the construction of the building started and a Unit with matching properties appeared on the map, false if not.

        Description copied from interface: IConstrucionInformation

      • getContendedTilePositions

      • getBuilding

        public bwapi.Unit getBuilding()
        Description copied from interface: IConstrucionInformation
        Function for retrieving the building that is actually constructed by the worker.
        Specified by:
        getBuilding in interface IConstrucionInformation
        Returns:
        the Unit reference of the building being created. Therefore this function returns null until the construction of the building started. After that the reference to the building is returned.
